bibl.title: The Image of the Ordered World in Ancient Nubian Art. The Construction of the Kushite Mind, 800 BC - 300 AD.
bibl.note: 44 figg. h. t., 8 tabl. et 30 pll.

Introduction. - 1. The sacred landscape of Nubia. - 2. Iconography and order in the world. - 3. Temple and society: historical memory and identity. - 4. Myth of the state, literacy, and literature. - Epilogue. - Bibliographical abbreviations. Index.
bibl.seg: TÖRÖK László, The Image of the Ordered World in Ancient Nubian Art. The Construction of the Kushite Mind, 800 BC - 300 AD. (Probleme der Ägyptologie. 18.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 2002, 8°, xix-525 pp. 44 figg. h. t., 8 tabl. et 30 pll. ISBN 90-04-12306-7. €132.

Introduction. - 1. The sacred landscape of Nubia. - 2. Iconography and order in the world. - 3. Temple and society: historical memory and identity. - 4. Myth of the state, literacy, and literature. - Epilogue. - Bibliographical abbreviations. Index.
